member.name: T:ColorizeNumber.ColorizeNumber
member.summary: ColorizeNumber, helps to create image data with number-color matching actions.
This class offers default number-color matching methods.

member.name: M:ColorizeNumber.ColorizeNumber.Frame.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.param: Resolution of the frame. It is size of array which is multiplied width and height.

member.name: T:ColorizeNumber.ColorizeNumber.RGBColor
member.summary: Simple color class. RGBColor holds red, green and blue on byte data type.

member.name: F:ColorizeNumber.ColorizeNumber.RGBColor.Red
member.summary: Variable holds pixel's data for red color. [0-255]

member.name: F:ColorizeNumber.ColorizeNumber.RGBColor.Green
member.summary: Variable holds pixel's data for green color. [0-255]

member.name: F:ColorizeNumber.ColorizeNumber.RGBColor.Blue
member.summary: Variable holds pixel's data for blue color. [0-255]

member.name: T:ColorizeNumber.ColorizeNumber.RGBColor.RGBColorEqualityComparer
member.summary: RGBColor equality comparer derived from IEqualityComparer interface.

member.name: M:ColorizeNumber.ColorizeNumber.RGBColor.RGBColorEqualityComparer.System#Collections#Generic#IEqualityComparer{ColorizeNumber#ColorizeNumber#RGBColor}#Equals(ColorizeNumber.ColorizeNumber.RGBColor,ColorizeNumber.ColorizeNumber.RGBColor)
member.summary: Compares two RGBColor based on their red, green and blue color.
member.returns: Returns true if colors are same, returns false if colors are different or one of the given color is null.

member.name: M:ColorizeNumber.ColorizeNumber.RGBColor.RGBColorEqualityComparer.System#Collections#Generic#IEqualityComparer{ColorizeNumber#ColorizeNumber#RGBColor}#GetHashCode(ColorizeNumber.ColorizeNumber.RGBColor)
member.summary: Returning hashcode with creating tuple of RGBColor's red, green and blue values.

member.name: M:ColorizeNumber.ColorizeNumber.CreateFrameFromData(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Func{System.Byte,ColorizeNumber.ColorizeNumber.RGBColor})
member.summary: Returns a frame with changing numeric value from given numericText via provided colorizeFunction.
member.exception: Throws expection if numberText data is null or empty.
Throws execption if colorizeFunction is not provided.

member.name: M:ColorizeNumber.ColorizeNumber.CreateBitmap(ColorizeNumber.ColorizeNumber.Frame,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Return Bitmap with using color data of given frame's array.
member.param: Frame whose RGBColor array will be used to create image.

member.name: M:ColorizeNumber.ColorizeNumber.GetBitmap(System.Drawing.Bitmap)
member.summary: Creates Frame with using colors of Bitmap.
member.param: Bitmap whose colors will be used to create frame.

member.name: M:ColorizeNumber.ColorizeNumber.ColorizeFunc(System.Byte)
member.param: A number whose value will be converted to color value.

member.name: M:ColorizeNumber.ColorizeNumber.ColorizeFuncByRate(System.Byte)
member.summary: Returns grayscale color by rate of number between 0 and 9.
member.param: A number whose value will be converted to color value.

member.name: M:ColorizeNumber.ColorizeNumber.ColorizeFuncByDuality(System.Byte)
member.summary: Returns two different colors based on its duality.
member.param: A number whose value will be converted to color value.
